column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As we waited for our order number to be called at Portillo's - this after having waited in a rather sizeable line to place our order - we heard numbers being called over and over again
column2: and patrons being reminded to look at the number on their receipts.  But then
column3: we got... the buzz.  Our number was up at Lou's and we had 5 minutes to get to our table!  We gave up on our hot dog and high tailed it back over.  Yes
column4: we became one of those numbers... poor Portillo's.
